resources.string: In this app you can find information about seals and bearings using in different models of old Soviet boxers: catalogue part numbers, dimencions and information about existing alternative parts for replacement
Select branch according with period of production, manufacturer and engine type and capacity of your motorcycle
This application is something like a table with seals and bearings using in old Soviet boxers and alternative replacers, but modified and made as phone application
1. First of all - dose of bad form. But this is IMPORTANT

In GooglePlay you can find this app in 2 versions: free and paid. Paid version have no any advantages or bonus futures. Free and paid versions are the same. Downloading of paid version - it is donate for this app. If the app was useful for somebody and he like this app, and, at the same time, he have financial opportunity and wish to help with development and updateing of app, so he can download paid version
2.3 What was fixed, changed and added in last update

First little hot-fix: 
 
 Fixed: 
 1. Year of end of manufacturing of M-72 model changed to 1957, of M-72M model changed to 1960 
 2. Bug with 1 journal bearing in all SV and most of Urals models engines was fixed 
 3. Bug with MT-10-36 type engine opening error was fixed 
 4. Feature when picture become big and fill the screen when you change orientation of phone to horisontal was deleted from description in "About app" page. At first, all the same it doesent worked in most of Android versions. And secondly, whole page will turning instead of it (look paragraph below) 
 5. Fixing of bad visualisation of screen content in phones and tablets with large high resolution screens is started. Indents of texts and pictures from border of screen in phones and tablets large screens should to stop to be so large, and should to become more or less the same for most of devices. In this update to that new content visualisation form are already changed main screens of motorsycles models and pages of units (engines, gearboxes, final drives, frames and wheels) 
 
 Updates: 
 1. Information about possebility to donate the app with downloading of paid version of app was deleted from "About app" page. Because paid version still not existing on Google Play. And, maybe, paid version will never exist 
 5. Paragraph with specifying of fixes and changes of last update was added to "About app" page 
 6. Updated list of what is planning to add to app in future
2.4 About one feauture of app interface
If you see in app screen picture, which is too small, to see details in it, try to turn phone to horisontal position. Usually, after that the picture become bigger and fill the screen
For return of previous small size of the picture turn phone to vertical position again
3. Few words about from what resources was taken information for the app

Original users manuals, spare parts catalogues and army repair and maintenance guides of М-72, М-72Н, К-750, К-750В, МВ-750, К-750М, М-63, К-650, М-66, МТ-9, МВ-750М, МТ-10, МТ-10-36, М-67-36, МВ-650М, МТ-11, МТ-12, МТ-16 и ИМЗ 8.103. Most of these literature was found in ghost.in.ua website.

 M-72 original drawings. You can find in internet and download em free.

 oppozit.ru website forum. Where I would like to tell about topic of forum user Creazyhead " Урал/Днепр. Подшипники и их импортные аналоги " from what that app was beginning. Additionally in that website was found part of used for app literature. 
 Some content for app i found in easthighway.com, moto-boxer.com and maxbmwmotorcycles.com websites. 
 Thanks to my friend and comrade in boxers Viktor for part of used literature. And for info about M-72 models. 
 Thanks to Dmitry Faust for info about Dneprs models
4. Now few words about what updates are planned
II. In somewhat more distant future and with doubts:
- drawing and adding of new drawings of models М-61, М-62, М-67, М-67-36 \n- adding of models ИМЗ-8.103-30 и ИМЗ-8.103-10

- adding of branch Late Russian 650CC and 720CC boxers (since 1991) 
- adding of branch Modern Russian 750CC boxers (since 1998) 
- adding of M-52 model: 
 
- adding of different electrical parts: 
- ignition systems 
- ignition coils 
- ignition HT leads and spark plugs cups 
- toggles / switchs 
- electrical brushes for alternators and generators 
- light bulbs 
- batteries 
 
- adding of more detailed information about recommended motor and gear oils 
- adding of recommended greases 
- adding of tyres and tyres inner tubes 
- adding of carburetors 
- adding of parts of motors, gearboxes, final drives, frames and wheels 
 
- adding of links to spare parts for buying or adding of possibility of making purchases from app
You can report about bug or error in application, ask a questions, express your wishes or claims to app to my
Maybe it will be available later
All the Soviet boxers with exception of very early M-72
Rear crankshaft bearing housing mashining needed
* Early М62 was equipped with Г-65 generator:
6204 gearbox of М62 model was middle model between 7204 gearbox and \" classic \" 6204 gearbox: inner parts of 6204 (rather, gears shifting clutches with small splines) + caseing from 7204.
Final drive М62 type is different from M72 type with that there are 45 needles 3x15,8mm instead of halfbearings (part numbers 7205238 and 7205239).
* According with Motorcycle Model M-66 Spare Parts Catalogue, AVTOEXPORT, USSR, Moscow

* In case of using these replasers in both of cases: \n-wlywheel pins (part number 7201225) should be replased to custom with thread pitch 1,25mm; \n-screw holes of drive thrust clutch disc (part number 7203122) are need in countersink.

* In case of using these replasers: \n-wlywheel pins (part number 7201225) should be replased to custom with thread pitch 1,25mm; \n-screw holes of drive thrust clutch disc (part number 7203122) are need in countersink.

All the seals below have construction different to construction of original seal, i.e. are not collar type. These seals have classical for present time construction type. \nBore in final drive casing in what it is possible to install such a seal can be different by diameter: from 58mm up to 60mm. According with that you should be guided when choose alternative seal for replacement, choosing between seals with outer diameter 58, 59 or 60mm.

Below are seals with hatching oriented for opposite direction of rotation. \nThese seals can be installed because speed of rotation of wheel in all ride regimes is much more lower then 2500rpm. But it is strongly recommended to install such a seals only in case of missing of possibility to install seal with hatching oriented for right direction of rotation.
Sidecar reduction drive left hand cover
Sidecar reduction drive right hand cover
* Seal should be chosen by outside diameter according with diameter of bore in final drive casing
Eccentric inner flat thrust spring retaining rings
Concentric outer flat spring retaining rings
It is needed to make groove(s) on cardan shaft to 16.8mm diameter
It is needed to make groove(s) on cardan shaft to 15.2mm diameter
It is needed to turn groove(s) in cardan shaft fork (forks) to 23.4mm diameter
Any additional info about spare part
BMW R45(N), R50/5, R60(all models), R65(LS), R75(all models), R80(GS, R, RT, ST), R90(all models), R100(GS, R, RT, CS(without air cooler), S(without air cooler) (from 1969-1996)

Solid polyamide snap cage, ball guided
Москвич-408 connection rod big end halfbearing
Specified size - is diameter of connection rod big end journal
Cardan shaft drive fork damping clutch turning needed
Kickstarter shaft rear bushing mashining needed (turning of original bushing or manufacturing of new one)
Left hand and right hand gearbox casing cover seal
Final drive casing bearing nut turning needed
Final drive casing bearing nut and universal joint fork turning needed
In hot or heavy duty conditions
